titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4418) to authorize appropriations for the National Science Foundation for fiscal years 1989 and 1990, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-653.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/25/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4418 (National Science Foundation funding).
